articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says Apple Vision Pro is '2nd most impressive tech since the iPhone' - VentureBeat
articles.description: Given Altman's impressions, it makes a lot of sense that OpenAI already shipped a visionOS version of the ChatGPT app last week.
articles.content: This is kind of a cheap Friday post, but I was struck by the fact that OpenAIs CEO and co-founder Sam Altman just posted on X/Twitter that he thought the new Apple Vision Pro is the second most impre… [+779 chars]

articles.title: Milky Way Galaxy's black hole warps spacetime, looks like a football, shows NASA's Chandra X-ray telescope - HT Tech
articles.description: Recent NASA findings reveal the Milky Way Galaxy's black hole, Sagittarius A*, is spinning rapidly, warping spacetime, potentially leading to energetic outflows.
